nodes.text: There's a scrap of paper wedged in the latch so that it didn't close tightly.
Judging from the nameplate, this is the door to Caesari and Joel's room. It's locked... but there's no obvious keyhole. Kinda makes it hard to break into...
Eh, I better not knock, Sosi might answer.
Well, what do you know, it opens!
This door is sealed shut. I can't budge it.
I can't tell if someone is talking in this room or not.
I can't hear anyone talking in the room anymore.
I can't hear anything; Sosi's probably asleep.
I don't think anyone's in the room right now.
What do you mean, you can't get to the treasure?
I told you, Caesari, there is a magical gate. It took both Shawn and Katie to open it.
If they can do it, you can do it.
No, you don't understand! The area is crawling with Undead Pirates, Gogs, and Sea Serpents, Caesari. It's worse than the Catacombs.
Please, Sosi, there are chests in the Catacombs... They are said to be filled with gold and jewels... a veritable king's ransom. We can go there, you and I...
If there is so much treasure in the Catacombs, why hasn't it been stolen?
There's a little matter of Skatters and Lemures...
Undead!
But don't worry... there's an amulet I can get - it protects against the Undead. And I have a Rune that the Undead cannot cross.
We could get that treasure, Caesari. You'll see, we'll be richer than Shawn and Katie. We won't need their stupid treasure.
You'd better be right about this, Joel. It will be very bad for you if you are mistaken.
I know...
So what do you think of this Shawn O'Conner person, Caesari? He could be useful, I am thinking.
Useful, hardly. He's just a peasant guttersnipe. Esme, on the other hand, could fit in very well...
Esme? But she is a female! How could she help us?
I'll have a little private chat with our lovely Rover girl.
Women do not keep secrets, everyone know that!
You'd be surprised at how many secrets a woman can keep.
But don't worry, Joel, you're far more useful to me than anyone else could be at this school.
So how did your meeting with Esme go? Not so well, I am thinking...
I don't want to talk about it.
I warned you that women are not to be trusted.
Shut up!
I do not want the Rogue Class shut down over these thefts. It would seriously interfere with my mission.
But Caesari, please, I am not a detective! I have no clue how to find the thief!
They say it takes a thief to catch a thief... so catch one.
Just keep an eye on Shawn. Who else is stupid enough to steal worthless stuff?
Heh, heh.
Are you having any luck with your 'mission?'
The only thing I've learned is that Terk is useless.
Perhaps if you would tell me more about it, I could be more helpful. I really want to help, Caesari.
What I need from you right now is a Cloaker.
But Caesari - Cloakers are very expensive! It would take more money than I have to buy one from the Fence.
Then you need to make more money. Just steal something.
But... but... we are not supposed to steal from the school. You know that, Caesari.
You don't really believe the crap Blowhard is shoveling, do you? You're a thief. You'll always be a petty, grubbing thief. So act like one! Get me a Cloaker.

nodes.message: Updated this event to only take place if Shawn was caught by Sosi and Terk. If Shawn hasn't been caught, nobody will be in the room.

nodes.text: There! We got the bastard. That's the last we'll see of Conner around here.
Why did you do this, Caesari? Shawn was funny and clever...
He was a distraction from my mission. I did not want him interfering with my plans.
I think you did this because the others liked him better than you.
No one gets in my way - no one! Not Conner, not Urwald, and not you.
You are useful to me, Joel. I will overlook your impertinence... for the moment.
Please, Caesari, I'm your friend. I get you things you want. I do your homework. You need me, yes?
Yes, I do need you, Joel. For now.
What have you learned so far?
Nothing, Caesari, she has found nothing. I told you that the map was worthless. The treasure must be long gone.
Continue to follow her whenever she goes to the Sea Caves. I want that treasure.
Caesari, it is dangerous down there. There are terrible monsters in the Sea Caves. Katie, she was attacked by a Gog and almost killed!
Please don't make me go down there again. It scares me.
Think of the treasure, Joel... treasure beyond your wildest imagination! A man can buy a throne for that much treasure. You wouldn't want that treasure wasted on a woman, would you?
<sigh> No, Caesari.
Good. I know I can count on you to find it.
Have you found the tomb yet?
I was getting close tonight, Caesari, but it's getting very dangerous down in the Catacombs. The Undead... So many Undead.
It will be better after the Nights of the Dead. The Undead will be at rest again. I'll wait a week and then try to find it.
No! You cannot delay this. I need that money, Kyro. I need it now.
But Caesari, please, the dead are watching down there. I see them everywhere. I cannot hide from them.
Here - take my money. Take all my money. Just do not make me go down there until things settle down again.
Bah! This money won't last me a week. I need that money today.
You will go down in the Catacombs tomorrow night and you will find that treasure. No excuses, no whining, I will hear not a word from you, Capisci?
Yes, Caesari.
I can't hear anyone talking in the room right now.
